name: Patchwork Pawls - Filmbilder & Friends
description: From the same creators as AnimaAnimals.

sections.Creator's Notes:
The Patchwork Song

I’ve got a patchwork blanket
Where my patchwork pals all play
They keep me safe at night and
Keep me happy in the day
When I wake up in the morning
And the day has just begun
I know that they’ll be waiting
And they’ll want to have some fun
Come on, let’s meet the monkey
He likes to fool around
Have you seen the lion?
The loudest roar in town!

Or maybe the chicken
An egg is what she’s planned
And if it’s not that easy
Somebody‘ll lend a hand!

I’ve got a patchwork blanket
Where my patchwork pals all play
They keep me safe at night and
Keep me happy in the day
When I wake up in the morning
And the day has just begun
I know that they’ll be waiting
And they’ll want to have some fun
 
The elephant’s got the hicc-ups
The fish no water, oh dear!
The sloth is lost for sleep
Who has a good idea?
 
The rhino’s rather gloomy
The pig’s so fond of mud
And if you’re really stumped - think
of the friends you’ve got!
 
I’ve got a patchwork blanket
Where my patchwork pals all play
They keep me safe at night and
Keep me happy in the day
When I wake up in the morning
And the day has just begun
I know that they’ll be waiting
And they’ll want to have some fun
 
Oh yes, and here’s the fox, what
is he up to now?
He wants them all for dinner
And he can show you how ---
 
No way, that’s a really bad idea!
 
I’ve got a patchwork blanket
Where my patchwork pals all play
They keep me safe at night and
Keep me happy in the day
When I wake up in the morning
And the day has just begun
I know that they’ll be waiting
And they’ll want to have some fun
 
My patchwork pals are happy now
There’s nothing more to say
We can wait until tomorrow
For another lovely day
 

Deutsche Version: https://youtu.be/5qq4z91f0MA

Patchwork Pals, created by: Angela Steffen
Lyrics & music: Claudia Kaiser & Martin Lickleder
Music video concept: Julia Thonig, Thomas Meyer-Hermann
Editing, compositing: Gideon Volle, Julia Thonig, Marianna Glanovitis
Animation: Angela Steffen, Sofiia Melnyk, Ara Jo, Eliza Płocieniak-Alvarez, Urte Zintler, Nora Marie Back, Christoph Horch, Frauke Striegnitz, Andrea Deppert
Production management: Bianca Just
Funding: MFG Baden-Württemberg
Production: Thomas Meyer-Hermann
Studio FILM BILDER 2020

Patchwork Penguin has a problem: he wants to run fast, but he doesn´t know how! Will the Patchwork Pals find a way to help him?

The Patchwork Pals have a problem: Squirrel is collecting all the nuts, but only for himself!
Will they find a way to make him share?

What´s happening on this blanket? Lots and lots of animals live here and everybody´s doing fine - but in this episode the chicken has a problem: The egg is stuck! Will the patchwork pals find a solution for this problem and help her?

PATCHWORK PALS were awarded Best Preschool Series at „Cartoons on the Bay" in Venice, 2014

Script, direction, design, animation:
Angela Steffen and Andrea Deppert
Voice: Kaya Kruczek
Sound: Andreas Mühlschlegel, Christian Heck
Artistic director: Andreas Hykade
Editor, SWR: Benjamin Manns
Funding: MFG Baden-Württemberg
Production management: Bianca Just
Co produktion: Angela Steffen and SWR
Production: Thomas Meyer-Hermann
Studio FILM BILDER 2013

https://www.facebook.com/patchworkpal
http://www.filmbilder.com

Awards:
Award for the best TV series, Expotoons, Buenos Aires, Argentina, 2014
Best Preschool Series, Cartoons on the Bay, Venice, 2014
